name: Kombate Mexicano Elexiones
description:
Kombate Mexicano Elexiones is a fighting game with digitized graphics of stereotypical Mexican characters.

What would happen if to elect the next president of Mexico you had to hold on to blows and anyone could participate?
Well that happens in Kombate Mexicano Elexiones.

- Choose one of 25 fighters... er... candidates who must face each other to defeat their opponents and achieve their most fervent wishes.

- Run over the competition with the Minibus of the Chaferoz, or punish the opponent with the Meat whip of Rigoletto the taquero, or perhaps take the rival for a walk to a ravine courtesy of Amado Félix. Lots and lots of interesting Mexico-style special moves.

- Train in practice mode, challenge a friend in vs mode, or strategize by watching machine vs machine in CPU vs CPU.

- Find hidden secrets throughout the game.

- Compatible with some controllers

- Will you have what it takes to be the next president? Accept the challenge of the Kombate Mexicano.
